title: Bright Top Floor Unit, Wood Floors & Walk-In Closet - 2 Weeks Free
posting_body: Top Floor 1Bedroom Corner Unit - 2 Weeks Free
Oxford Crest Apartments - Seattle Property Management Associates
The Oxford Crest apartments were built in 1929 and still maintains much of its Old World charm.
It is located near Virginia Mason, Swedish and Harborview hospitals.
There is a plethora of shops, bars and restaurants within walking distance as well as many entertainment attractions that can be found on Capitol Hill.
Enjoy the convenience of having a large and enclosed outside dog run on property where Fido can fetch and play.
This fetching 1 bedroom faces the interior courtyard and receives great natural light.
There are hardwood floors throughout, new vinyl in the kitchen and bathroom, a walk-in closet off the bedroom and a cozy L-shaped kitchen.
At the time of application, we require payment of the $25 application fee per person and a $1000 deposit that is then applied to the refundable security deposit upon approval.
There is a $75 monthly utility for water/sewer/garbage per person.
For more information or to schedule a viewing, please contact us at
